app_description: Learn to lucid dream in 30 days with the ultimate lucid dreaming coach. As you explore the life changing technique of lucid dreaming you ll be guided by experts. With tools like Am I Dreaming reminders sleep cycle tracking peak dreamtime audio guides and a dream journal designed for nighttime it has never been more possible to awaken within the dreamworld. You are about to make a major upgrade to your mind with the Shape app for lucid dreaming. ACTIVATE DREAMTIME UPGRADE YOUR MIND Humans sleep for more than 30 of their lives. Activate dreamtime and upgrade your mind. LEARN THE LIFE CHANGING TECHNIQUE OF LUCID DREAMING Open an audio guide press play and learn the technique of lucidity. AM I DREAMING Create the habit of questioning reality with Am I Dreaming reminders. DREAM JOURNAL DESIGNED FOR NIGHTTIME Familiarize yourself with the dream state and remember your dreams. DREAMSIGNS Identify the dreamworld and become lucid. SLEEP PATTERNS Understand your night s sleep: REM Deep Core and Awake sleep phases. PEAK DREAMTIME Know when you re dreaming and use these insights to set a wake back to bed WBTB alarm. ARTICLES LEARNING Prime the mind for lucidity by reading about lucid dreaming and sleep before bedtime. TESTIMONIALS CUSTOMER REVIEWS I had a lucid dream the night I downloaded this app 5 Star App Review I feel more creative and grounded just by using the app 5 Star App Review I am blown away... I had the first lucid dream I ve had in months and one of the very few I ve ever had in my life. 5 Star App Review The quality of dreams is becoming less agitated and more peaceful. This app has changed my life. 5 Star App Review I have remembered more of my dreams than ever before 5 Star App Review I had a dream breakthrough within the first few days of using the app 5 Star App Review This is a great way to track progress. There are no limits to your dreams... to be what you want to be go where you want to go and talk to who you want to talk to. 5 Star App Review The narration is incredibly relaxing and easy to follow 5 Star App Review Shape is the best lucid dreaming app I ve ever encountered 5 Star App Review What is lucid dreaming It s the art of awakening within the dream world. Once lucid dreamers can fly face fears perform deep personal work practice a skill meditate visit a wise person anything. Lucid dreaming clarifies the nature of reality and the role perception plays in defining how we exist in the world freeing the dreamer from self imposed limitations. Shape is made with love and designed to help people improve self awareness and achieve their highest aspirations. We love architecture design meditation nature and lucid dreaming. To learn about our terms approach to privacy visit https: shapedream.co terms. To access all of Shape s best offerings become a premium member. You ll have access to unlimited dream journal entires and every audio guide. After a 7 day trial Shape costs 39.99 per year or 9.99 per month. These prices are in USD and may vary by region. Cancel in your iTunes account settings at least 24 hours before renewal. Shape integrates with Apple s Health app reading writing Sleep data for the purposes of understanding sleep cycles and identifying dreamtime. Fall asleep remain conscious.
